msbt.message: Do you eat anything special for New Year's? Last year I tried to go all out, .I made up a huge batch of . I put everything I had into it. Almost literally!I took a big bite anddecided to eat a frozen dinner instead. Yeah
I get major warm fuzzies whenever someone sends me a holiday card.I've been wanting to return the favor, but I keep forgetting. I'm gonna do it this year though.<10_4 /> Maybe
New Year's kinda weird when you think about it. The only thing that's really different is the date. Nothing around us has actually changed since yesterdaybut in a way, everything has!
I can't wait to see how this place changes over the year. Hey, I got a resolution for you, if you want Try to make even more awesome every day. Oh, and keep being a rockin' friend.
I remember one year I threw a great, big New Year's bash at my place. Everyone had a blast!And I didn't finish cleaning till April, .
